original_text: Until now, we continue to be hungry and thirsty. Our clothes have become old. Sometimes people hit us for no reason. We do not have our own homes.
korean_text: 바로 이 시각까지 우리가 주리고 목마르며 헐벗고 매맞으며 정처가 없고

sentences.original_text: Until now, we continue to be hungry
Sometimes people hit us for no reason
sentences.korean_translation: 때때로 사람들은 이유 없이 우리를 때립니다

sentences.original_text: We do not have our own homes
